entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 70%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
